text: Justino Hernández Hilaria (born 14 April 1955) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing San Luis Potosí. == See also == * 1991, San Luis Potosí state election ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Luis Potosí Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Justino Hernández Hilaria
